name: Lid of a lidded tea pot
description: Lid of a lidded tea pot; Etienne-Henri Le Guay (French, 1719/1720 - about 1799), Sèvres Manufactory (French, 1756 - present); Sèvres, France; about 1765 - 1770; Soft-paste porcelain with polychrome enamelled decoration and gilding; 2.5 × 5.7 cm (1 × 2 1/4 in.); 89.DE.25.5.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Lid of a lidded tea pot
medium: Soft-paste porcelain with polychrome enamelled decoration and gilding
